text: Well, I’ve never been the best at riddles, but here we go...

Even though it has sails, it does not move from its hill.
Even though it has blades, it is useless to go tilting at it.
Even though it grinds, it has no teeth to eat.
The Beacon is opening. Quick, send someone to retrieve its content!
What… Argh, the Beacon teleported! No matter, we’ll look for it and get it right next time. Commander, punch it!
